sudoku.generate

Class TargetGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • sudoku.generate.TargetGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SudokuGenerator

    public class TargetGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
implements SudokuGenerator
    Tries to create sudoku boards with the target number of clues. Will give up and return null after a certain number of attempts.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TargetGenerator(int p, int q, int clues, long tries)
      Constructs a sudoku board generator able to generate boards with the given dimensions.
      TargetGenerator(SudokuBoard board, int clues, long tries)
      Constructs a sudoku board generator able to generate boards with the same dimensions as the given board.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SudokuBoard getProblem()
      Returns a random minimal well formed sudoku with the same dimensions as specified in creation of this generator, or null if failure.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TargetGenerator

        public TargetGenerator(int p,
               int q,
               int clues,
               long tries)
        Constructs a sudoku board generator able to generate boards with the given dimensions.
        Parameters:
        p - the small box width
        q - the small box height
        clues - the target number of clues this generator should aim for
        tries - how many iterations to tries before just returning

      • TargetGenerator

        public TargetGenerator(SudokuBoard board,
               int clues,
               long tries)
        Constructs a sudoku board generator able to generate boards with the same dimensions as the given board.
        Parameters:
        board - a sudoku board
        clues - the target number of clues this generator should aim for
        tries - how many iterations to tries before just returning

    • Method Detail

      • getProblem

        public SudokuBoard getProblem()
        Returns a random minimal well formed sudoku with the same dimensions as specified in creation of this generator, or null if failure. This generator tries to generate a sudoku problem with the given number of clues. If after some number of attempts, no problem was found, null is returned.
        Specified by:
        getProblem in interface SudokuGenerator
        Returns:
        a random minimal well formed sudoku problem, or null on failure
